sentences.en: Aren't mommy and daddy gonna worry if you're not home before dinner?
sentences.cn: 你不回家吃晚饭,你父母不担心吗?

sentences.en: Be very good and very quiet and help your mommy.
sentences.cn: 你要乖乖的，安静些，要帮妈咪。

sentences.en: David: No. No, no, no! No, Mommy, please! No, no. Please, Mommy.
sentences.cn: 大卫: 不, 不, 不! 不, 妈妈, 求求你! 不, 不, 求求你, 妈妈.

sentences.en: Doesn't It'seem like everywhere mommy goes she finds dead bodies?
sentences.cn: 妈妈去别的地方不是都发现尸体 么 ?

sentences.en: I'll have to ask my mommy.
Just watch your toons and have a great day with Mommy today, okay?
sentences.cn: 看你的卡通和妈妈乖乖在家好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mommy and I went in an aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我和妈妈登上一架飞机。

sentences.en: Mommy, can I draw a picture on the wall?
sentences.cn: 妈妈, 我可以在墙上画画儿 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mommy, l saw a boy out there run as fast as the train!
sentences.cn: 妈, 我见到有个人跑得跟火车一样快!
妈咪, 上面有白色的东西.

sentences.en: Mommy, you don't need to stay while we talk.
sentences.cn: 妈妈,我们谈话时你不必陪着.

sentences.en: My son screamed: " Mommy, don't touch those , they are disgusting ! "
sentences.cn: 我的儿子尖叫着 说 妈妈别 碰 它们!

sentences.en: No formula, just mommy's healthy natural breast milk.
sentences.cn: 没什么处方, 就喝天然健康的母乳.

sentences.en: When Mommy comes, just tell her I'm up here.
sentences.cn: 妈妈来了就告诉她我在这上面。

sentences.en: You and Mommy used to take me on the ferryboat.
sentences.cn: 你和妈妈常带我坐渡船.

trans.tran_en: mother – used by or to young children
